title: Ep. 406: Makeup Trends, Nail Art & The Week’s Beauty News with Guest Co-Host Cat Quinn
itunes:title: Ep. 406: Makeup Trends, Nail Art & The Week’s Beauty News with Guest Co-Host Cat Quinn
description:
Cat Quinn, the executive director of global trend for MAC Cosmetics, predicts the next big things in beauty—and she's here to share them with the Fat Mascara Fam! Get ready to hear about: velvet lips, skater-boy blush, poplighting, corset nails, and jelly manicures. Plus, she and Jenn talk about a retail charter that aims to address racial bias in retail stores; why “reef-safe sunscreen” is a misnomer; Half Magic’s Magic Brownie; the Doré “French pharmacy” skincare line; how to stop biting your nails, stacked lashes, hairline-only keratin smoothing treatments, and so much more.

  • Shop the products mentioned on Ep. 406: shopmyshelf.us/collections/51653
  • Links and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182


Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
